title: Looking for a Bronze-Silver ranked 5
body:
Really looking for an active ranked team that plays consistently ( 10-20 games a week)
I main Adc and mainly play {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:18}}  but can play every marksman to a decent level.


Hit me up IG if you've got a free spot for me <3

replies.body: hi where lookngg for a adc main to join ourr ranked team im currently silver 2 i main mid our jg is silver 2 and our top is gold 1 if your interested i wantt to do training gammes once of twice a week ffor a few hours then as many ranked games on a sunday we can get

Sure, can you add me in game? or do you have Skype/Teamspeak?

Cheers
